game.name: Cube Raiders
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, PvP, 스크린 공유 및 분할 PvP, 협동, 스크린 공유 및 분할 협동, 공유 및 분할 화면, Steam 도전 과제, Steam Cloud, Remote Play Together, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Cube Raiders is a fun puzzle game for one or two players where you have to combine groups of dice using the energy of MagnetoGloves. Thanks to this power, it is possible to push or rotate the dice to solve the levels while trying to avoid the traps of each temple.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Cube Raiders is a fun puzzle game for one or two players where you have to combine groups of dice using the energy of MagnetoGloves. Thanks to this power, it is possible to push or rotate the dice to solve the levels while trying to avoid the traps of each temple.
